summary:
Easy to use variable lenght input parser mechanism that provides a convenient way to enchance your custom function parameter handling. The current version sports a MATLAB implementation, but other language ports are coming too.
Features

Arbitrary parameter order
Three mode of operation
Key value pair mode
Bulk mode
Flag mode ...
